Class Person

java.lang.Object
  Person

public class Person
extends java.lang.Object

Models a Person to represent name, surname, age and gender. There have also been implemented ways to change such information afterwards.

Version:
0.1.0
Author:
Jose Manuel Estrada-Nora Mu√±oz

getCriticalAge

public int getCriticalAge()
Provides a number of years depending on which stage of life is the person.

Returns:
Number of years until adulthood, number of years until retirement or number of years past retirement.
